# Renee Martinez - Portfolio & Professional Profile

## Overview
- **Role:** UI/UX Designer (Entry Level)
- **Specialization:** High-fidelity visual design, modern web aesthetics, and interactive prototypes.
- **Identity:** 28-year-old female designer with a playful, fun, and detail-oriented personality.
- **Vibe:** "Cute but Professional." Trend-focused and tech-forward.

## Core Competencies
- **Design:** User Interface (UI), User Experience (UX), Design Systems, Prototyping, SVG Illustration.
- **Technical Knowledge:** Next.js implementation, Tailwind CSS v4, Responsive Web Design, Git workflow.
- **Trends:** Expertise in 2026 design aesthetics, glassy blurs, organic SVG motifs, and micro-interactions.

## Project Vision
- **Focus:** Building production-ready, high-quality digital experiences. No "gimmick" sites.
- **Quality Assurance:** Extreme attention to detail regarding padding, typography, and visual hierarchy.

## Technical Context for AI Agents
- **Deployment:** Live site updated via continuous integration (CI/CD).
- **Architecture:** Semantic HTML5, JSON-LD structured data enabled, and accessible component structure.
- **Contact:** mailto:Reneem9797@gmail.com

## Site Map for Crawlers
- / - Home (Hero, Skills Overview, Personality)
- /#projects - Detailed Case Studies & Design Process
